name: Quality Suites Nice La Malmaison

reviews.text: Stayed few nights on my own. Booked their delux room which was quite and comfortable. Useful fridge to keep the beer and water cold. Did not take their breakfast, so can not comment.
reviews.title: comfortable and quite room

likes.liked: — quite and good size room and bathroom

aka: Quality Suites Nice La Malmaison Hotel Nice
description: The Quality Suites Nice La Malmaison is in the heart of this Nice on the beautiful and famous French Riviera. Within walking distance to all the major attractions and museums of the city, the Quality Suites Nice La Malmaison also is close to the famous Promenade des Anglais, the beach, convention center, business and shopping districts.The Quality Suites Nice La Malmaison recently reopened with a new contemporary look after a complete renovation.
